properties.Name: AmbulatoryPatientCareCode
properties.Description:
Ambulatory Payment Classification, outpatient reimbursement system based upon methodology developed by 3M for HCFA.
Payments are based on groupings of similar services requiring similar professional services and supply utilization

Columns.Name: ApcCode
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an APC Code.

Columns.Name: ApcCodeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of an APC Code.

Columns.Name: ReimbursementAmount
Columns.Description: The reimbursable amount associated with the APC code.
